name: Elements (Assembly)
description:
The game "Elements" is a part of my 10th-grade finale computers class score in school.

Elements is an interactive computer game against a computer which attacks randomly. The game operates like the well-known childhood game, Rock- Paper- Scissors. I improved the traditional game by switching it to an electronic version, by turning it into a single-player game and by adding a variety of visual aids. In addition, I changed the items in the game to natural elements: fire, air and earth which make the application far more pleasant.

I draw all the pictures that are shown in the game myself in a software called FireAlpaca
